name: Barbarian
description: A fierce warrior whose fury fuels relentless assaults.

name: Bard
description: A performer and storyteller who can weave magic through music and lore.

name: Cleric
description: A champion of the gods who channels divine magic to heal and smite.

name: Druid
description: A guardian of the wilds whose spellcraft and shapechanging draw upon nature.

name: Fighter
description: A master of arms adept with weapons, armor, and battlefield tactics.

name: Monk
description: A disciplined artist of martial combat who channels inner energy into precise strikes.

name: Paladin
description: A sworn knight bound by oath who combines martial prowess with divine blessings.

name: Ranger
description: A hunter and wanderer who excels at tracking foes and surviving the wilderness.

name: Rogue
description: A deft infiltrator who relies on agility, subtlety, and precision strikes.

name: Sorcerer
description: An innate spellcaster whose magic arises from a powerful lineage or force.

name: Warlock
description: A wielder of eldritch powers who forges a pact with a mysterious patron.

name: Wizard
description: A learned spellcaster who records arcane discoveries in a spellbook.
